# statedist

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Compute covariate-dependent state-distributions from fitted hidden Markov models.

## Installation

You can install the development version of statedist from [GitHub](https://github.com/janoleko/statedist) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("janoleko/statedist")
```
